name: MongoDB on a Single VM
description: MongoDB - An open-source cross-platform document-oriented database.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a single node of MongoDB in VMware for development use, where MongoDB is an open-source cross-platform document-oriented database.

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description: MongoDB:an open-source cross-platform document-oriented database, classified as NoSQLÂ database

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Cores - 1
      • Memory - 1GB
      • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 27017 from all sources
      • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  • 2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  • 3. More details of software can be found in https://www.mongodb.com/.
